curator-search.description: Enter the name of your group to find a curator
curator-search.search-default: Enter the name of your group in the field above to find a curator.

faq.content:
How to register on the campus?

If you are an officially employed teacher and more than two weeks have passed since submitting your documents to the HR department - contact the person in charge at the department or the head of the department to submit an official letter. If you are a student or graduate student - contact your academic curator.

How to recover your password?

To recover your password, use the button on the authorization panel. If you have not used the campus before - contact your curator.

about.title: About
about.content:
Information and telecommunications system "Electronic Campus" - application software, which is an element of the information and telecommunications environment of the university and is used for information support of the daily activities of students, teachers, university employees, as well as for information support of all types of innovative activities at the university (hereinafter referred to as ITS EC).

ITS EC unites internal information resources (educational, methodological and others), provides centralized access to them on the basis of unified system and technological solutions and ensures their use for effective management and planning of the scientific and educational process.

Main functions of ITS EC

ITS EC ensures the implementation of the following main functions:

  • multilateral communication between students, teachers, scientific community;
  • formation of a single information resource that reflects the state of the scientific and educational process of the university;
  • ensuring timely and operational placement of: complete, objective, reliable and consistent information about the educational process of the university;
  • dissemination of information about upcoming events and activities and other reference information;
  • ensuring centralized and convenient access to information about the activities of the administration and university departments;
  • ensuring navigation through the entire information content of the ITS EC;
  • organizing interaction and information exchange between the ITS EC and other information resources and systems of the university.

The ITS EC system has developed virtual offices according to user profiles: student, lecturer-scientist, methodologist of the department.

how-to-register.header: How do I register on campus?
how-to-register.content:
If you are an officially employed teacher and more than two weeks have passed since submitting your documents to the HR department - contact the person in charge at the department or the head of the department to submit an official letter.

If you are a student or graduate student - contact your academic curator.

how-to-restore-password.content: To recover your password, use the button on the authorization panel. If you have not used the campus before, contact your supervisor.

terms-of-service.title: Terms of service
terms-of-service.content:
The editorial board of the project "Electronic Campus «KPI»" is not responsible for the consequences of using the project information. The visitor uses the project information at his own risk. The opinion of the editorial board may not coincide with the opinion of the authors of the publications.

All rights reserved. All copyright materials created specifically for the project "Electronic Campus «KPI»", or translations from other sources, as well as the layout are the property of the project.

Reproduction of any copyright information provided on the site is possible only under the condition of mandatory placement of a link to the site "Electronic Campus «KPI»" (ecampus.kpi.ua), in web-based media a hyperlink is mandatory.

It is forbidden to hide hyperlinks, use JavaScript in a hyperlink or limit the indexing of hyperlinks by search engines! The hyperlink must be placed above or below the material, unless otherwise provided for by the design of the site using the material.

All methodological materials presented in the Campus are the intellectual property of the authors, their use is allowed only for the educational process of KPI. Teaching methodological materials of the Campus on social networks without the written permission of the authors is prosecuted in accordance with the Law of Ukraine “On Copyright”.

codeOfHonor.title: Code of honor
codeOfHonor.content:
<paragraph>The presented <documentsLink>documents</documentsLink> of the National Technical University of Ukraine "Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute" were developed taking into account the experience and examples of the best universities in the world.

The text was formed on the basis of proposals from the university community, student self-government bodies and trade union organizations.

The adoption of the principles and norms given in these documents is certified by the consent of a member of the university community.

<paragraph>
